page.title: 03Times gone by
page.content: The Square in Grantown has not changed but the traffic has. All the traffic was horse drawn. There was a{horse drawn milk cart that came round twice a day. You went out with a milk can and your money and the man would fill the can with milk for you. There were two{horse drawn buses. There were no fire engines, just barrows with hoses and a ladder. The shops have changed quite a lot over the years because there used to be no supermarkets and the shops were small. The Primary School is different in that it used to be the Grammar School as well. They played games we play now, like football, cricket and shinty. There was a cinema on the site of the British Legion.
